sentences.en: A unity invariably tends to break up into different parts.
sentences.cn: 统一体总要分解为不同部分的.

sentences.en: Conceit and complacency are the archenemy of unity.
sentences.cn: 骄傲自满是团结的大敌.

sentences.en: Long live the great unity of the people of the world!
sentences.cn: 全世界人民大团结万岁!

sentences.en: Mr Morris was determined to put on a show of family unity.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯先生决心摆出一副家庭团结的样子。

sentences.en: Stability and unity are a prerequisite to the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 安定团结是实现四个现代化的前提.

sentences.en: The captain did his best to foster a sense of unity among the new recruits.
sentences.cn: 队长尽力培养新成员之间的团结精神.

sentences.en: The end result of this will be unity.
sentences.cn: 此事的最终结果将是统一。

sentences.en: The keynote of his speech was unity.
The placebo effect can be understood only if we acknowledge the unity of mind and body.
sentences.cn: 只有我们承认身心一体，安慰剂效果才能被理解。

sentences.en: The rumpus has made all the optimistic statements about unity and harmony ring a little hollow.
sentences.cn: 这一番吵闹使得所有关于团结和谐的乐观言论听起来都显得有几分空洞。

sentences.en: There is solid unity throughout the nation.
This article lacks unity and coherence.
Unity is the guarantee of victory.
We must strengthen our unity in the face of powerful enemies.
sentences.cn: 大敌当前,我们必须加强团结.

sentences.en: When we speak of unity, we do not mean unprincipled peace.
sentences.cn: 所谓团结, 并非一团和气.

words.tran_cn: 一致的，统一的；团结的，和睦的
团结一致地；联合在一起地
使团结；使联合；使结婚（unite的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 团结就是力量；众志成城

trans.tran_cn: 统一体，（艺术等）完整，（文学、戏剧）（情节、时间和地点的）统一性，团结一致
trans.tran_en: when a group of people or countries agree or are joined together
